'''Ramaso''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Ramaso is the wealthiest merchant in the Radiant Court, selling a broad variety of items in his emporium. He started with one stall, then slowly bought out his competition.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons, armor, ingredients, adventuring gear. Unique items include the [Pale Hide](/paleHide/), [Eager Blade](/eagerBlade/) and [Amra](/amra/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
